Capitalized terms not otherwise defined: Capitalized terms not otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy or the Terms of Use shall have the following meaning.
shall mean any information that relates: shall mean any information that relates to a natural person, which, either directly or indirectly, in combination with other information available or likely to be available with an organization, is capable of identifying such person who is not otherwise publicly available. For avoidance of doubt, examples of personal information include a person‘s name, address (including work addresses and work email addresses), date of birth, voice, opinions about people, national insurance number, driving license number, permanent account number, etc.
shall mean personal information, which c: shall mean personal information, which consists of information relating to any to the following of an individual:

And Africa will use the User Information: And Africa will use the User Information provided by You only in accordance with the purposes described in this Policy.
In general, You can visit Our platform w: In general, You can visit Our platform without revealing Your identity or any personal information. Minors are prohibited from using Our ser: Minors are prohibited from using Our services and We are committed to not collecting Personal Information from any minors viewing the platform.
During Your use of Our platform, We may: During Your use of Our platform, We may collect and process such information from You, including but not limited to the below mentioned:
Information that You provide to Us by fi: Information that You provide to Us by filling in forms on the platform. This includes both Personal Information and Sensitive Personal Information including contact information, name, gender, email address, mailing address, phone number, financial information including bank account details, payment instrument details, details of employment and terms thereof, details of investments made by the User, if any, unique identifiers including user name, account number, password and personal preferences including favourites lists, transaction history and investment preference. At the time of creating Your Profile on the platform, You will be notified and be allowed to customize the information that is available to the public and that shall be private.
Information relating to Your business pr: Information relating to Your business provided by you or available to the general public may be used by Us on the platform or otherwise as agreed to in the Terms of Use or such additional Service that you may have subscribed to. As a default setting, And Africa shall be creating a basic profile of Your company / business, which is available to the general public containing name, logo, sectors, twitter pitch, team, product etc. And Africa will also be creating a detailed profile from the information that You provide as well as collected from the platform, which contains all data available with And Africa relating to Your company including traction, financials, investors, timeline, competition etc. The detailed profiles can be accessed only by registered users of And Africa. You will have the option of limiting access to the information in the basic profile to the public at large as well as in restricting access to the detailed section only to registered users of And Africa approved by You.
Information that You provide when You wr: Information that You provide when You write directly to Us (including by e-mails or letters);
Information that You provide to Us over: Information that You provide to Us over telephone. We may make and keep a record of the information You share with Us.
Information that You provide to Us by co: Information that You provide to Us by completing surveys, feedbacks etc.
Information relating to logs is automati: Information relating to logs is automatically reported by Your browser each time You access a web page. When You use the platform, Our servers automatically record certain information that Your web browser sends whenever You visit any website. These server logs may include information such as Your web request, Internet Protocol (IP) address, location (through GPS) browser type, referring/ exit pages and URLs, number of clicks, domain names, landing pages, pages viewed, click paths, feature usage and other such information. We use this information, which may identify users, to analyze trends, to administer the site, to track users movements around the site and to gather demographic information about the user base as a whole.
When You use the platform, We may employ: When You use the platform, We may employ clear web beacons which are used to track Your online usage patterns. In addition, We may also use clear web beacons in HTML-based e-mails sent to You to track which e-mails are opened/ viewed and which links were opened by You. Such collected information is used to enable more accurate reporting and making the platform better for Our users.
And Africa will not collect Sensitive Pe: And Africa will not collect Sensitive Personal Data or Information from You unless the collection of such sensitive personal data or information is considered necessary for the purpose for which it is being collected and even in such a case, You will be made aware of the following:
The fact that Your Sensitive Personal Da: The fact that Your Sensitive Personal Data or Information is being collected.

You shall have the option of not disclos: You shall have the option of not disclosing Your Sensitive Personal Data or Information to And Africa. In the event that you choose not to disclose Sensitive Personal Information, You may not be able to access multiple areas of the platform or services provided on the platform.
You shall have the right, upon request,: You shall have the right, upon request, to access and review Your Information provided to Us. You may decline to submit identifiable information through the platform, in which case You may not be allowed to access certain features / parts of the platform. If You are a registered user, You may update or correct Your account information and email preferences at any time by logging in to Your account. Alternatively, if You believe that any of Your information held by Us is inaccurate, You may write to Us at zenventures@andafrica.co.jp
It is Your responsibility to ensure that: It is Your responsibility to ensure that any information You provide to Us remains accurate and updated.
The Information collected by Us shall no: The Information collected by Us shall not be retained for longer than is required for the purpose for which the information may lawfully be used or is otherwise required under any other law for the time being in force.
Cookies are small files that reside on Y: Cookies are small files that reside on Your computer‘s hard drive and generally contain an anonymous unique identifier and are accessible only by the website that placed them there and not any other sites (Cookies).Some of Our web pages and services may also utilize Cookies and other tracking technologies to collect information about Your general internet usage.
You may refuse to accept Cookies by acti: You may refuse to accept Cookies by activating the setting on Your browser which allows You to refuse the setting of Cookies. However, if You select this setting You may be unable to access certain parts of Our platform. Unless You have adjusted Your browser setting so that it will refuse Cookies, Our system may issue Cookies when You log on to the platform. The use of Cookies by Our partners, affiliates, advertisers or service providers is not covered by the Policy.

We may disclose Your Personal Informatio: We may disclose Your Personal Information to third-party service-providers, solely in the course of their provision of services to Us. We will take reasonable precautions to ensure that these service-providers are obligated to maintain the confidentiality of Your information.

We may disclose Your Personal Information, if We are under a duty to do so in order to comply with any legal obligation, or to protect our rights, property, or safety, or those of Our users, or other third parties. This includes exchanging information with other companies and organizations for the purposes of fraud protection and credit risk reduction.
We may disclose Your information, withou: We may disclose Your information, without Your prior consent, to governmental and other statutory bodies who have appropriate authorisation to access the same for any specific legal purposes.
And Africa requires all third parties wi: And Africa requires all third parties with whom it shares any Sensitive Personal Information to implement the same level of data protection that And Africa has adopted, as provided for under the IT Rules.
Our Website may, from time to time, cont: Our Website may, from time to time, contain links to and from the websites of Our partner networks, affiliates and other third parties. The inclusion of a link does not imply any endorsement by Us of the third party website, the website’s provider, or the information on the third party website. If You follow a link to any of these websites, please note that these websites may be governed by their own privacy policies and We disclaim all responsibility or liability with respect to these policies or the websites. Please check these policies and the terms of the websites before You submit any information to these websites.
Similarly, Our Website can be made acces: Similarly, Our Website can be made accessible through a link created by other websites. Access to Our Website through such link/s shall not mean or be deemed to mean that the objectives, aims, purposes, ideas, concepts of such other websites or their aim or purpose in establishing such link/s to Our Website is necessarily the same or similar to the idea, concept, aim or purpose of Our Website and/or Our services or that such links have been authorized by Us. We are not responsible for any representation/s of such other websites while affording such link and no liability can arise upon Us consequent to such representation, its correctness or accuracy.
We endeavor to securely store all inform: We endeavor to securely store all information we gather within databases controlled by Us. However, We may store information in locations outside our direct control (for instance, on servers or databases co-located with hosting providers.
Our databases are stored on servers secu: Our databases are stored on servers secured behind a firewall; access to the servers is password-protected and is strictly limited. However, no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure. Therefore, while We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your information, We cannot guarantee its absolute security.
We use commercially reasonable safeguard: We use commercially reasonable safeguards to preserve the integrity and security of Your information against loss, theft, unauthorized access, disclosure, reproduction, use or amendment.
The information that We collect from You: The information that We collect from You may be transferred to, and stored at, a destination inside or outside Japan. By submitting Your information on Our Platform, You agree to this transfer, storing and/ or processing. We will take such steps as we consider reasonably necessary to ensure that Your information is treated securely and in accordance with this Policy.
In using the Platform, You accept the in: In using the Platform, You accept the inherent security implications of data transmission over the internet and the world wide web cannot always be guaranteed as completely secure. Therefore, Your use of the Platform will be at Your own risk.
We assume no liability for any disclosur: We assume no liability for any disclosure of information due to errors in transmission, unauthorized third party access or other acts of third parties, or acts or omissions beyond Our reasonable control and You agree that You will not hold Us responsible for any breach of security.
In the event We become aware of any brea: In the event We become aware of any breach of the security of Your information, We will promptly notify You and take appropriate action to the best of Our ability to remedy such a breach.
You agree to immediately report to Us al: You agree to immediately report to Us all incidents involving suspected or actual unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, loss, damage, or destruction of data.
Any Sensitive Personal Data or Informati: Any Sensitive Personal Data or Information provided on the Platform is encrypted using secure socket layer technology (SSL) while transferring such Sensitive Personal Data or Information.
As a registered user with an account and: As a registered user with an account and a password, You are responsible for keeping Your password confidential.
We will keep confidential and protect an: We will keep confidential and protect any and all information provided by You except where disclosure is required or permitted by law.
You may obtain certain confidential info: You may obtain certain confidential information, including without limitation, information related to other users or third parties including investors and companies and technical, contractual, product, pricing, business related functions, activities and services, customer lists, knowledge of customer needs and preferences, business strategies, marketing strategies, methods of operation, markets and other valuable information in relation to such Users or third parties that should reasonably be understood as confidential (Confidential Information). You acknowledge and agree to hold all Confidential Information in strict confidence. Title and all interests to all Confidential Information shall be vested in Us.
We provide access of Personal Informatio: We provide access of Personal Information to employees, agents, advisors and consultants who We believe reasonably need to come into contact with that information to provide services to You or in order to do their jobs.
We may provide information, including Pe: We may provide information, including Personal Information, to third-party service providers to help Us deliver Our services efficiently and effectively. Service providers are also an important means by which We maintain Our Platform and mailing lists. We will take reasonable steps to ensure that these third-party service providers are obligated to protect Personal Information on Our behalf through confidentiality agreements and otherwise.
We do not intend to transfer Personal In: We do not intend to transfer Personal Information without Your consent to third parties who do not agree to be bound to act on Our behalf or under this Privacy Policy unless such transfer is legally required. Similarly, it is against Our policy to sell Personal Information collected online without consent.
The restrictions set out herein shall no: The restrictions set out herein shall not apply to disclosure of Confidential Information if and to the extent the disclosure is:
required by the applicable law of any ju: required by the applicable law of any jurisdiction.
required by any applicable securities ex: required by any applicable securities exchange, supervisory or regulatory or governmental body to which the relevant party is subject or submits, wherever situated, whether or not the requirement for disclosure has the force of law.
made, by And Africa, to its shareholders: made, by And Africa, to its shareholders, managers, advisors and affiliates.
made to employees and representatives on: made to employees and representatives on a need to know basis, provided that such persons are required to treat such information as confidential through written agreement in terms which are no less strict than this Policy.
This Policy does not apply to any inform: This Policy does not apply to any information other than such information collected by And Africa through the Platform. This Policy shall not apply to any unsolicited information You provide Us through this Platform or through any other means. This includes, but is not limited to, information posted to any public areas of the Platform. All such unsolicited information shall be deemed to be non-confidential and And Africa shall be free to use, disclose such unsolicited information without limitation.
You acknowledge and agree that any User: You acknowledge and agree that any User Information you provide directly or indirectly to another User of the Platform, whether or not through the Platform, may not be subject to the same security or confidentiality offered by And Africa and that And Africa shall not have any responsibility in respect of such information under this Policy even if it was provided through the Platform.
You agree to indemnify and hold And Afri: You agree to indemnify and hold And Africa harmless from:
any actions, claims, demands, suits, dam: any actions, claims, demands, suits, damages, losses, penalties, interest and other charges and expenses (including legal fees and other dispute resolution costs) made by any third party due to or arising out of any violation of the terms of this Policy.
any acts or deeds, including for any non: any acts or deeds, including for any non-compliance or violation, of any applicable law, rules, regulations on Your part.
We have made every effort to ensure that: We have made every effort to ensure that this Policy adheres with the applicable laws. The invalidity or unenforceability of any part of this Policy shall not prejudice or affect the validity or enforceability of the remainder of this Policy.
The rights and remedies available under: The rights and remedies available under this Policy may be exercised as often as necessary and are cumulative and not exclusive of rights or remedies provided by law. It may be waived only in writing. Delay in exercising or non-exercise of any such right or remedy does not constitute a waiver of that right or remedy, or any other right or remedy.
Please write to Us at zenventures@andafr: Please write to Us at zenventures@andafrica.co.jp to:
address any questions You may have about: address any questions You may have about the collection, processing, usage, disclosure of Your information

in relation to the functioning of any se: in relation to the functioning of any service You have signed up for in order to ensure that We can deliver the services to You.
in relation to any transaction entered b: in relation to any transaction entered by You on Our Platform to subscribe to services.
where You have opted to receive further: where You have opted to receive further correspondence.
to invite You to participate in surveys,: to invite You to participate in surveys, opinion polls, etc., about Our services or otherwise (participation is always voluntary).
to provide you updates and information i: to provide you updates and information in relation to Our services.
We may update this Policy to reflect cha: We may update this Policy to reflect changes to Our practices. If We make any material changes We will notify You by e-mail (sent to the e-mail address specified in Your account) or by means of a notice on this Platform upon the change becoming effective. We encourage You to periodically review this page for the latest information on Our privacy practices. By using this Platform and Our services, you consent to the terms of this Policy and to our use and management of User Information for the purposes and in the manner herein provided.
The angel stage is aimed at getting a ne: The angel stage is aimed at getting a new company started.  Typically, it is a relatively small amount sourced from family, friends, individual angel investors or angel investor groups.
This is the first official funding round: This is the first official funding round for a company, it can also involve angel investors or venture capital (VC) companies.  This round helps a company through its first steps like marketing, product development etc. and usually ranges from around $10 000 up to $1/$2 million.
This series of funding is used to optimi: This series of funding is used to optimise your product or service.  You are already established with a clear revenue stream or user base but need to optimize your business model in order to create a sustainable business. Series A funding is generally between $2 million and $15 million.
This stage of funding is used to consoli: This stage of funding is used to consolidate your business. You already have a successful revenue generating business model but want to grow your company by hiring new talent, investing in advertising, sales and making sure your company has a solid base for future expansion.  Series B typically involves amounts of $7 million to $10 million.
Your company is relatively well establis: Your company is relatively well established and successful but you need to achieve scale.  This is where Series C funding comes into play. You want to create new products, enter new markets, or even acquire a competitor. At this stage more risk averse investors like banks, private equity, or hedge funds may start investing in your company.
It is unusual for companies to continue: It is unusual for companies to continue on to Series D or E funding.  At this stage your company is large and well-established with a valuation over $50 million or even $100 million.  This stage can be considered a final push at expansion and consolidation before an IPO.
ZenVentures is operated by And Africa Co: ZenVentures is operated by And Africa Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "And Africa
By using any of the ZenVentures websites: By using any of the ZenVentures websites you acknowledge that you have read and are bound by the following Terms, as well as any other ZenVentures’ network usage agreements that may govern your conduct.
Your Information is collected on the Sit: Your Information is collected on the Site when you voluntarily provide it. We also automatically collect certain online activity information as described below under “Log Files.” For example, ZenVentures collects Your Information (IP address, including your first name, last name, email address and country) when you register and open an Account. You may fill out a Profile (including your city, organizational affiliation, biographical information and other personal data) to supplement Your Information.
ZenVentures relies on a number of truste: ZenVentures relies on a number of trusted 3rd parties to assist with our operations.  Depending on the exact nature of your account and what you’ve requested we do, your data may be share with one of these partners.  We carefully evaluate each to make sure they are handling your personal data with the utmost of respect, security and privacy.
Use and Disclosure of Your Information: Use and Disclosure of Your Information
ZenVentures will use Your Information to: ZenVentures will use Your Information to facilitate the services you request through the Site. ZenVentures may display Your Information partially from your Profile on the Site and/or to other persons to facilitate social networking in the ZenVenture’s community. Please do not include any information in your Profile that you do not wish ZenVentures to share with others in this manner.
ZenVentures may share information that i: ZenVentures may share information that is collected on any of ZenVenture’s Sites including:
personal information you knowingly choos: personal information you knowingly choose to disclose that is collected on an individual basis (voluntary registration);
Site use information collected on an agg: Site use information collected on an aggregate basis as you and others browse our sites;
Site usage information tied to your pers: Site usage information tied to your personal information,
communications you make with other users: communications you make with other users of the ZenVentures’ Sites. Zen Venture’s may choose to share this information with its affiliates, event organizers and/or sponsors upon request.
ZenVentures may also use Your Informatio: ZenVentures may also use Your Information in an aggregated, anonymous form consistent with ZenVentures’ charitable purposes, including disclosing it to certain third parties for research purposes and publishing research based on analysis of data.

ZenVentures may also use Your Information for such purposes as contacting you to let you know about updates to the Site, activities related to the Site, and ZenVentures’ related charitable activities. You may unsubscribe to these messages by following the procedures described in the correspondence.
As we continue to develop our organizati: As we continue to develop our organization, we may buy or sell parts of our organization or assets. In such transactions, confidential customer information generally is one of the transferred business assets and may be disclosed in connection with negotiations relating to a proposed transaction. In the event of a transaction involving the sale of some or all of ZenVentures’ organization, customer and site visitor information may be one of the transferred assets.  In such case, the transferred information may become subject to a different privacy policy.
ZenVentures reserves the right to disclo: ZenVentures reserves the right to disclose Your Information to respond to a subpoena, court order or other legal processes, to defend ZenVentures against legal claims, or if ZenVentures determines it is necessary to investigate or take action in connection with activities that ZenVentures suspects are illegal, threaten the safety of any person or are in violation of these Terms.
ZenVentures may use “cookies” to make it: ZenVentures may use “cookies” to make it easier for users to access the Site. A cookie is a small amount of data that is sent to your browser from a web server and stored on your computer’s hard drive. We use cookies to allow faster and easier access to your account information, monitor traffic on the site and measure traffic patterns to improve functionality. You may disable cookies in your internet browser, but this may limit your access to the Site and affect your use of certain features or functions. web pages may in the future contain electronic images known as web beacons or other advanced technologies that are useful in the provision of services to you.  We may use such devices to verify compliance with our terms and conditions of use or with any promotions on the site.
ZenVentures is committed to compliance w: ZenVentures is committed to compliance with its privacy obligations in the United States and throughout the world. This EU Data Directive Privacy Notice sets forth the privacy principles ZenVentures follows with respect to personal information transferred from within the European Union to Japan. This notice applies to the personal information of European Union Citizens maintained by ZenVentures in the ZenVentures’ database.
The General Data Protection Act (GDPR) i: The General Data Protection Act (GDPR) is a set of privacy and digital security regulations enacted by the European Commission which sets out to provide some basic protections to personal and sensitive data of EU residents.
User Rights Under the General Data Prote: User Rights Under the General Data Protection Regulation
Right to be forgotten - data subjects ca: Right to be forgotten - data subjects can request personally identifiable data to be erased from a company’s storage. Data will take 72 hours to be completely wiped from the site. The company has the right to refuse requests if they can successfully demonstrate the legal basis for their refusal.
Data subjects can review the data that a: Data subjects can review the data that an organization has stored about them.
Data subjects can refuse permission for: Data subjects can refuse permission for a company to use or process the subject’s personal data. The company can ignore the refusal if they can satisfy one of the legal conditions for processing the subject’s personal data, but must notify the subject and explain their reasoning behind doing so.
Data subjects can expect inaccurate pers: Data subjects can expect inaccurate personal information to be corrected.
Data subjects can access the personal da: Data subjects can access the personal data that a company has about them and transfer it.
Collection and Use of Anonymous Informat: Collection and Use of Anonymous Information/*Log Files
As is true of most websites, we gather c: As is true of most websites, we gather certain information automatically and store it in log files. This information includes internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, internet service provider (ISP), referring/exit pages, operating system, date/time stamp, on-site bookmarks, on-site subscriptions, clickstream data and site navigation history.
We may link this automatically-collected: We may link this automatically-collected data to personally identifiable information. This information is tied to personally identifiable information to provide you with feedback about your experiences on the Site and to provide you with information that you may find interesting or informative. ZenVentures may also link this information to a particular individual or combine it with personal information if ZenVentures has determined that it needs to identify a user because of safety or security issues or to comply with legal requirements.
We do not share this automatically-colle: We do not share this automatically-collected data with third parties except those that provide direct services to us to facilitate the upkeep and operation of the Site.
ZenVentures takes reasonable precautions: ZenVentures takes reasonable precautions to host and maintain the Site in a secure manner and to safeguard it from unauthorized access but it does not take special precautions. Your Information is stored in limited access servers.
Neither ZenVentures nor its service prov: Neither ZenVentures nor its service providers can guarantee that any transmission of personal information over the Internet will be secure and you use the Site at your own risk.
You agree to use ZenVentures responsibly: You agree to use ZenVentures responsibly and in a professional manner, and to hold us harmless against any damage that may happen to you or your company as a result of your use of ZenVentures. You also hereby expressly indemnify us from any claim for damages, rectification, specific performance claimed by another user of the Site or 3rd party arising from you or your company’s use of ZenVentures.
By using any of the ZenVentures websites: By using any of the ZenVentures websites you acknowledge that you have read and expressly consent to be bound by this General Terms & Conditions as well as ZenVentures’ Privacy Policy and any other ZenVentures’ network usage agreements that may govern your conduct.
By using the Site, you expressly consent: By using the Site, you expressly consent to and the uses of Your Information described in it. By providing Your Information on the Site, you consent to transfer Your Information to Japan and storage, processing and use of Your Information in Japan and to the transfer of Your Information to ZenVenture’s service providers. You further consent to use and disclosure of Your Information as set forth in this Privacy Policy.
Minors are prohibited from using Our ser: Minors are prohibited from using Our services and we are committed to not collecting Personal Information from any minors viewing the platform.
Review and Update of Your Information; D: Review and Update of Your Information; Deactivation of Your Account
You should be sure that your Profile is: You should be sure that your Profile is always accurate and complete. You may review and modify your Profile at any time by logging into your account except for scheduled maintenance which we shall inform you in advance and any unexpected technical issues. If you wish to deactivate your registration at any time via an email request to us if your Account is in good standing.
However, we may retain a copy of Your In: However, we may retain a copy of Your Information for our record.
Users of ZenVentures must understand tha: Users of ZenVentures must understand that we have virtually unlimited rights to reject any user of our Service, to delete any content, or to publish content provided to us by users on their ZenVentures public profiles, including for the purposes of marketing our Service. This is not applicable to applications submitted for partner programs on the ZenVentures platform. Information provided in applications are strictly confidential.
As a user of ZenVentures you agree that: As a user of ZenVentures you agree that you will not post, email or make available any content or use ZenVentures
In a manner that infringes, violates or: In a manner that infringes, violates or misappropriates any third party’s intellectual property rights or other proprietary rights or contractual rights;
In a manner that contains software virus: In a manner that contains software viruses or any other computer code, files or programs designed to interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any computer software or hardware or telecommunications equipment;
To engage in spamming, “chain letters,”: To engage in spamming, “chain letters,” “pyramid schemes”, advertisement of illegal or controlled products or services, or other advertising or marketing activities that violate these Terms of Service, any applicable laws, regulations or generally-accepted advertising industry guidelines;
To make unsolicited offers (in any form): To make unsolicited offers (in any form) or to make reference to any financial related service (or other) without the explicit consent of the ZenVentures organization;
In a manner that is misleading, deceptiv: In a manner that is misleading, deceptive or fraudulent or otherwise illegal or promotes illegal activities, including engaging in phishing or otherwise obtaining financial or other personal information in a misleading manner or for fraudulent or misleading purposes;
In a manner that is libelous or defamato: In a manner that is libelous or defamatory, or in a way that is otherwise threatening, abusive, violent, harassing, malicious or harmful to any person or entity, or invasive of another’s privacy;
in a manner that is hateful or discrimin: in a manner that is hateful or discriminatory based on race, color, sex, religion, nationality, ethnic or national origin, marital status, disability, sexual orientation or age or is otherwise objectionable;
To impersonate any other person, or fals: To impersonate any other person, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity, or to obtain access to ZenVentures without authorization;
To interfere or attempt to interfere wit: To interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper working of ZenVentures or prevent others from using ZenVentures, or in a manner that disrupts the normal flow of dialogue with an excessive number of messages (flooding attack) to ZenVentures, or that otherwise negatively affects other persons’ ability to use ZenVentures;
To use any manual or automated means, in: To use any manual or automated means, including agents, robots, scripts, or spiders, to access or manage any user’s account or to monitor or copy this Network or the content contained therein;
To facilitate the unlawful distribution: To facilitate the unlawful distribution of copyrighted content;
In a manner that includes personal or id: In a manner that includes personal or identifying information about another person without that person’s explicit consent;
In a manner that employs misleading emai: In a manner that employs misleading email or IP addresses, or forged headers or otherwise manipulated identifiers in order to disguise the origin of content transmitted through ZenVentures or to users;
In a manner that constitutes or contains: In a manner that constitutes or contains any form of advertising or solicitation if emailed to users who have requested not to be contacted about other services, products or commercial interests.
Collect, use or disclose data, including: Collect, use or disclose data, including personal information, about other users without their express consent or for unlawful purposes or in violation of applicable law or regulations;
Request, solicit or otherwise obtain acc: Request, solicit or otherwise obtain access to usernames, passwords or other authentication credentials from any member of ZenVentures or to proxy authentication credentials for any member of ZenVentures for the purposes of automating logins to ZenVentures;
Use automated means, including spiders,: Use automated means, including spiders, robots, crawlers, data mining tools, or the like to download data from ZenVentures – except for Internet search engines (e.g. Google) and non-commercial public archives (e.g. archive.org) that comply with our robots.txt file, or “well-behaved” web services/RSS/Atom clients. We reserve the right to define what we mean by “well-behaved”;
Post irrelevant content, repeatedly post: Post irrelevant content, repeatedly post the same or similar content or otherwise impose an unreasonable or disproportionately large load on ZenVentures’ infrastructure;
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to o: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our computer systems or engage in any activity that disrupts, diminishes the quality of, interferes with the performance of, or impairs the functionality of ZenVentures;
Use ZenVentures as a generic file hostin: Use ZenVentures as a generic file hosting service;
Take any action that may undermine the f: Take any action that may undermine the feedback or ratings systems (such as displaying, importing or exporting feedback information off of ZenVentures or for using it for purposes unrelated to ZenVentures;
Develop, invoke, or utilize any code to: Develop, invoke, or utilize any code to disrupt, diminish the quality of, interfere with the performance of, or impair the functionality of ZenVentures.
You agree not to authorize or encourage: You agree not to authorize or encourage any third party to use ZenVentures to facilitate any of the foregoing prohibited conduct. Under no circumstances within the confin: Under no circumstances within the confinement of law will a refund of any Fees, or any other fees which may be applicable, be permitted.
When and where was ZenVentures founded?: ZenVenturesはいつどこで創業されたのですか？
ZenVentures was founded by And Africa Co: ZenVenturesはアンドアフリカ株式会社によって、2018年12月にローンチされたサービスブランドです。アンドアフリカ株式会社は東京に本社を置く、コンサルティングサービスおよび投資アドバイザリーを行うファームで、南アフリカのヨハネスブルグに支店を設けています。
How do I contact ZenVentures?: ZenVenturesにコンタクトを取るにはどうすれば良いのでしょうか？
Please visit our contact page to see our: コンタクトページから当社の住所、電話番号、オンラインコンタクトフォームをご確認いただけます。
How do I partner with ZenVentures?: ZenVenturesとパートナーシップを組みたい場合は、どうすれば良いでしょうか？
Please register to our platform first, a: まずは本プラットフォームにご登録下さい。その上で、パートナーシップに関する詳細について、コンタクトページから当社に直接お問い合わせください。
Does ZenVentures conduct any pitching ev: ZenVenturesではピッチングイベントを行なっていますか？
Yes, ZenVentures will be holding selecti: はい、ZenVenturesでは南アフリカのヨハネスブルグでピッチングイベントを実施しております。ピッチングイベントの詳細につきましては、コンタクトページから当社に直接ご連絡いただくか、当社のプラットフォーム上にて発信される情報を適宜ご確認ください。
Who can use the ZenVentures platform?: 誰がZenVentures platformを利用できますか？
The ZenVentures platform can be used by: ZenVenturesのプラットフォームは、企業、起業家、個人投資家、ファンド、求職者の方々にご利用いただけます。当プラットフォームの役割は、日本および先進国の投資家と、アフリカのスタートアップおよび起業家、優秀な人材のマッチングを行うことです。
Which countries does ZenVentures operate: ZenVenturesはどの地域で運営を行なっているのですか？
We currently have a physical presence in: 当社は日本と南アフリカに拠点を構えております。ZenVenturesは主にオンラインプラットフォームであるため、どの国のユーザーも無料で登録してサービスに加入できます。アフリカ諸国と先進国の投資家との間の主要な橋渡しになるよう、他のアフリカ地域や先進国への拡大を図って参ります。
Is the ZenVentures platform free?: ZenVenturesnのプラットフォームは、無料で利用できますか？
The first three months after launch will: サービスローンチ後の最初の3ヶ月は無料でご利用いただくことができます。それ以降も無料にてアカウントは継続保持頂けますが、パートナー候補のリスト閲覧、詳細情報確認、コンタクリクエストにはサブスクリプションのお申し込みが必要となります。
Will ZenVentures invest in my company?: ZenVenturesは直接投資を行なっていますか？
No. We are not an investment firm – ZenV: 当社は投資企業ではなく、ZenVenturesにて日本およびその他の先進国の投資家とアフリカのスタートアップ 、起業家、優秀な人材をつなぐためのプラットフォームを運営している企業です。
Why should I sign up for ZenVentures?: なぜZenVenturesに登録すべきとお考えですか？
ZenVentures is the first curated platfor: ZenVenturesは、日本の投資家の皆様とアフリカの新興企業や起業家とを結びつけるための最初の基盤となるプラットフォームです。 投資家の皆様は、ZenVenturesプラットフォームに参加することで以下の利点を得ることができます:
Access to a unique and curated selection: 日本の企業、投資家の皆様と有望なアフリカのスタートアップや起業家のニーズを深く理解している当社を通じて、アフリカのユニークで厳選されたスタートアップ、起業家、優秀な人材にアクセスすることができます。
A personalised matchmaking process – we: パーソナライズされたマッチメイキングプロセス–業界、資金調達要件、およびその他の適格基準に基づいて、投資家とアフリカの新興企業および起業家とを直接マッチングすることができます。
Access to a database of skilled employee: 高度なスキルを持った人材へのアクセスが可能です。高度なビジネススキルを持つ人材と直接マッチングすることによって、貴社がアフリカ諸国の優れた人的資本を効率的に見つけることが可能です。
How does ZenVentures interact with inves: ZenVenturesはどのようにして投資家と連携するのですか？
Registration. The first step is for you: 登録：最初のステップは、ZenVenturesへの登録です。これにより、データベースを参照して、あなたの興味を惹くスタートアップ、起業家、個人を検索することが可能となります。
次に、または詳細情報をリクエストしてください。 現時点では、あなたが興味を持っている起業家、起業家、個人に関する詳細な情報を受け取ったり、直接連絡を取ったりすることができます。
Creating a commitment. At this stage you: コミットメント：この段階では、2つの選択肢があります。 最初のマッチメイキング後にZenVenturesプラットフォームとは別のプライベートディスカッションを続行することができ、ZenVenturesに対して更にデューデリジェンスやマッチメイキングを依頼することができます。
What does ZenVentures charge to investor: ZenVenturesは投資家に対して何を請求しますか？
After the initial three-month trial peri: サービスローンチ後の最初の3ヶ月は無料でご利用いただくことができます。それ以降も無料にてアカウントは継続保持頂けますが、パートナー候補のリスト閲覧、詳細情報確認、コンタクリクエストにはサブスクリプションのお申し込みが必要となり、その場合は月額18-30 USDの利用料が発生します。
For standard matchmaking services betwee: 投資家/企業とスタートアップ/起業家/個人間での標準的なマッチメイキングサービスの場合、標準のサブスクリプション料金以外の料金はありません。
For any further due diligence, in-depth: さらなるデューデリジェンス、徹底的な調査のために、詳細なマッチメイキングは、投資家および関連当事者が最終的に得た取引の価値に基づいて5〜10％の手数料を請求します
For Startups \/ Entrepreneurs \/ Individ: スタートアップの皆様/ 起業家の皆様/ 個人の皆様
ZenVentures is the first integrated plat: ZenVenturesは、日本と他の先進国投資家との間で、アフリカの新興企業、起業家、個人との直接マッチングサービスを提供する最初の統合プラットフォームです。プラットフォームに登録することで、次の利点が期待できます:
Access to a large pool of interested inv: 資金や知識、技術のプールを持つ投資家のネットワークへのアクセス.
A curated platform that aims to find the: 貴社または貴社の製品・サービスに適するパートナー企業等（卸売企業・小売企業等）を見つけることが出来ます
The potential to find employment at majo: アフリカで事業を行っている、またはアフリカ人従業員の雇用に関心を持つ日本企業への就職チャンスを獲得出来る。
How does ZenVentures support startups\/e: ZenVenturesはどのようにスタートアップ/起業家/個人を支援するのか？
We support startups in the following way: 私たちは以下の方法でスタートアップを支援します:
We provide access to a database of Japan: 私たちは、日本をはじめとする先進国の企業や投資家のネットワークへのアクセス機会を提供します。
We proactively support you in your match: 私たちは、お客様が投資、雇用、非財政的な支援を探しているかどうかにかかわらず、マッチングプロセスを通じて積極的にサポートします。
We bridge the trust and information barr: 当社は、プラットフォームを通じて情報や、コミュニケーション、そして必要とされる審査を本プラットフォームを通じて提供し、アフリカ諸国のスタートアップ、起業家、個人と先進国の投資家間の信頼と情報の障壁を橋渡しする役割を担います。
How do I create a good profile?: どのようにして良いプロフィールを作れますか？
Be clear and succinct with the informati: プロフィール欄に、あなたに関する情報を明確かつ簡潔に記載してください。資金調達をご希望の場合は、エンジェル/シード/シリーズAなどの投資ラウンドを指定し、会社のビジョンと製品、事業分野、およびあなたのビジネスに関する追加情報を2-3文で説明してください。
ZenVentures is an online and offline ent: ZenVenturesは、アンドアフリカ株式会社が運営する、オンライン・オフラインの起業家エコシステムです。
We support all types of startups, invest: 当社は、資金調達、顧客獲得、人材獲得と言った機会を得るためのプラットフォームを通じ、あらゆるスタートアップ、投資家、そしてプロフェッショナルを支援致します。
Meet the team: 運営企業のチームについて
Founder & CEO of And Africa Co., Ltd. He: アンドアフリカ創業者・CEO：アフリカのスタートアップのエコシステムの創造に注力している。資金調達、顧客獲得、メンタリング、ビジネススキル伝達などについて、アフリカの若い起業家とコミュニケーションし、サポートすることに情熱を持つ。
He used to work at major consulting firm: 東北大学、同大学院卒業後、デロイトなどの大手コンサルティングファームで計5年間勤務した後、日本からアフリカへの中古車輸出事業を知人と共同創業。その後、アンドアフリカを創業しアフリカの若い起業家の支援、並びに日本企業のアフリカ事業展開支援を行なっている。
Executive: Building the African entrepre: アンドアフリカ役員：アフリカの起業家エコシステム構築をライフミッションとしている。プレトリア大学（化学工学）、ゴードン・ビジネスサイエンス大学院（経営管理）、ウィッツ・ビジネス・スクール（起業家精神、新ベンチャー創造の修士号）卒業。AT Kearney、RIISの戦略とイノベーションのアドバイザリーに携わった後、アフリカの起業家を支援するために「DUYO」を設立。 南アフリカに拠点を置くアフリカ全域の起業家エコシステムの開発に取り組んでいる。2018年8月よりアンドアフリカに参画。
Executive: Driving investments into emer: アンドアフリカ役員：新興市場への投資を促進します。ケープタウン大学（政治経済学）、オックスフォード大学大学院（経済学）卒業。ケープタウンのPwCに勤務し、JET（Japan Exchange and Teaching Program）に参加。 直近では、USのローファームであるDavis Polk＆Wardwellで商業に関する法務アドバイザリーに従事。2018年11月よりアンドアフリカに参画。
Executive: Developing business solutions: アンドアフリカ役員：新興市場におけるビジネスソリューションの開発に注力。これまでに、タイなどでのソリューション提供に従事。創価大学（経営学部）卒業後、SAPビジネスアナリティクス事業本部にて、日本の非製造業を中心とする中堅企業に対するコンサルティング営業に従事。2018年11月よりアンドアフリカに参画。
South Africa Branch : 625 Mias Str. Gar: 南アフリカ支店 :  625 Mias Str. Garsfontein, Pretoria, South Africa
About And Africa: アンドアフリカ について
And Africa is a consulting and investmen: アンドアフリカは、東京（本社）及び南アフリカ（支店）を拠点とするアドバイザリーファームです。
And our mission is to promote industrial: 当社のミッションは、アフリカにおける産業化、雇用創出を促進することです。
And also to create exponential growth op: また、日本の企業や投資家にとっての「指数関数的な」成長機会を創出致します。
Industrialization, and contribute to job: 産業化を促進し、アフリカにおける雇用創出に貢献する
Development of efficient African start-u: 効果的なアフリカスタートアップエコシステムを構築する
Create exponential growth opportunities: 指数関数的な成長の機会を創造する
Develop innovative partnerships: 革新的なパートナーシップを構築する
